title: Advanced TicTacToe
subtitle: (Socket-based Multiplayer Mobile Game)
description: Developed a Real-time TicTacToe Application with built-in FriendList Management System like PUBG, integrated Real Time Challanges, QR Room's with proper Authentication, password reset system, implemented hashing mechanisms to provide security.

title: Shop-it
subtitle: (e-commerce web and mobile platform)
description: Developed a dynamic e-commerce web & mobile Application using MERN stack that provides the functionality to the users to manage their wishlist, carts (Used Redux Toolkit) and make purchases of product/variants. Implemented good amount of security checks to prevent any misbehaviours. Used Razorpay as a payment gateway to securely transfer the payments. Developed separate admin panel to manage CRUD of categories, orders, products, product-variants.

title: NEWS APP
subtitle: (SSR-based NEWS Application)
description: Developed simple news application using EJS + Node js + MongoDB, that can be used locally inside an institute/college to create local news updates. Each user holds the right to create a News Post and can edit or delete it anytime. Implemented express-sessions to provide user's login security.
